alfredsnippet.snippet:
When writing MCP tools, ensure we are integration testing them e2e as much as possible.

things to verify:
- use https://github.com/f/mcptools to wire up test scenarios in shell scripts.
- use https://github.com/f/mcptools to ensure the tools descriptions make sense and are not too verbose
- don't emit anything to stdout/stderr if you can help it - use log files + return appropriate error messages to the mcp response so the user is aware
alfredsnippet.name: MCP Testing
